original: The 15th century is marked by the prominence of several notable Croatian painters, with one being recognized as the most significant artist of the era. His works are housed in prestigious galleries worldwide, reflecting his impact on the art scene. Among other distinguished Croatian-born Renaissance artists who lived and worked abroad are the Laurana brothers, Francesco (Franjo Vranjanin) and Luciano (Luka Vranjanin), miniaturist Giulio
